sections.TOP: Starring cast appearances054914avduvxxw5xp5kqzjig6ji3bzrmqngm1812972015-04-05T21:59:10ZArticXiongmao15030876/* Season 5 */ Actually he's Ramsay BOLTON by now ;)The '''starring cast''' of a television series are those actors credited in the opening titles.

'''Notes'''
*Fourth season "guest starring" cast members promoted to the starring cast for the fifth season are [[Michiel Huisman]], [[Nathalie Emmanuel]], [[Dean-Charles Chapman]], [[Indira Varma]], [[Michael McElhatton]] and [[Diana Rigg]].
*Second season "guest starring" cast member promoted to the starring cast for the fifth season is [[Tom Wlaschiha]].

sections.Season 3:
'''Starring'''

The following starring cast members are credited during the title sequence at the beginning of each episode they appeared in:
# [[Peter Dinklage]] as [[Tyrion Lannister]]
# [[Nikolaj Coster-Waldau]] as [[Jaime Lannister]]
# [[Lena Headey]] as Queen [[Cersei Lannister]]

'''Notes'''
*Second season "guest starring" cast members promoted to the starring cast for the third season are [[Joe Dempsie]], [[Rose Leslie]] and [[Oona Chaplin]].
*[[Richard Madden]], [[Stephen Dillane]], [[Carice van Houten]], and [[Natalie Dormer]] are now credited individually onscreen.
*[[Emilia Clarke]], [[Kit Harington]] and [[Richard Madden]] are credited fourth through sixth respectively, now ahead of [[Michelle Fairley]] and [[Iain Glen]].

'''Starring'''

'''Also Starring'''
*[[Jason Momoa]] as KhalÂ [[Drogo]]
'''Notes'''
*Dinklage was the last starring cast member to appear in the first season credit sequence, receiving the "and" modifier. He is now the first credited.
*First season "guest starring" cast members promoted to the starring cast for the second season are [[Charles Dance]], [[John Bradley]], [[James Cosmo]], [[Jerome Flynn]], [[Conleth Hill]] and [[Sibel Kekilli]].
*[[Kit Harington]]Â is now credited individuallyÂ onscreen.
*New cast members joining the starring cast for the second season are [[Liam Cunningham]], [[Stephen Dillane]], [[Carice van Houten]] and [[Natalie Dormer]].
*HeadeyÂ is credited ahead ofÂ Coster-WaldauÂ andÂ FairleyÂ for the first time.
*Momoa appeared only in [[Valar Morghulis]], but retained the "Also Starring" credit he was given in Season 1 at the end of that episode.
